title: @Riot Rakan and Xayah skins?
body: Will they always have intertwining skins when the time comes?

replies.body: We haven't thought that far ahead honestly, haha. We're still working on finishing up their launch skins. :P

Might I recommend a return to the Tango line? 

Maybe as part of Evelynn's rework she can share a dance with Tango Twisted Fate in the same way Rakan and Xayah share a dance.
go for it. people do enjoy the skin synergy of kalista and thresh when it happens and with rakan and xayah it fits so well
Would be pretty awesome for them to have skin synergy animations.
